Task.Message: Remote Desktop Services session state changes are notified to RD Connection Broker
Task.Name: SessionNotification

Task.Message: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Task.Name: ProcessRequest

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: The server failed to retrieve the local computer netbios name. Error: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: The server failed to retrieve the local computer FQDN. Error: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: This Remote Desktop Session Host server cannot participate in RD Connection Broker load balancing because the server is configured to use a Microsoft Windows Server 2003-based Session Directory server %1. The Session Directory feature in Windows Server 2003 does not support Remote Desktop Connection Broker load balancing.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Services failed to join the Connection Broker on server %1. Error: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Services successfully joined a farm on the Connection Broker server %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client terminate
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Services failed while leaving the Connection Broker on server %1. HRESULT = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client terminate
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Services successfully left a farm on the Connection Broker server %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client failed to initialize while joining the Connection Broker on server %1. Error: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client failed while getting redirection packet from Connection Broker. User : %1\%2 Error: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client successfully received redirection packet from Connection Broker. User : %1\%2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Connection Broker Client start up
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker on server %1 failed to repopulate sessions. HRESULT = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: Remote Desktop Services session state changes are notified to RD Connection Broker
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker on server %1 returned error on %2 notification. Session Id : %3 Error: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="param4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client rejected a call from an unauthorized ip address %1. HRESULT = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client received request for redirection. User : %1\%2 RDP Client Version : %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: %2 existing sessions were successfully repopulated on Remote Desktop Connection Broker server (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker on server %1 failed to get Cluster credentials. HRESULT = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker client successfully retrieved Cluster credentials from Connection broker (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: RPC Connection with Remote Desktop Connection Broker on server %1 has been lost. We will try to reestablish connection.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client failed to redirect the user %1\%2. Error: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client successfully redirected the user %1\%2 to the endpoint %3. Ip Address of the end point = %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: User %1\%2 will be logged on to the local redirector machine (assuming TS Farm scenario). Sending local IP address to the client in the redirection packet.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: RD Connection Broker Client processes request from a user
Event.Message: Remote Desktop Connection Broker Client failed to initialize Session Arbitration Helper object for user %1. %2 Error: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="param3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
